about_the_game:
Set sail for adventure and embrace your inner pirate in Plunder—an expansive, open-world MMO. Assemble formidable crews with allies, engage rival factions and other pirates in thrilling battles, and showcase your creativity by crafting and customizing your ship's interior. Seek hidden treasures across vast, uncharted waters, earn reputations, embark on countless quests, and immerse yourself in a boundless world of piracy!

Multiplayer, co-op or just solo


Set sail on a treasure-hunting journey for crews of all sizes - from lone wolves to dynamic duos and bustling pirate herds. Join forces and embrace the adventure together in ships crafted for every crew!

Ship Mechanics

Embark on a ship experience as you hoist your sails, wield the anchor, and take command of the steering wheel to outmaneuver enemies and conquer the high seas!


Diverse Ship Models: Choose from a wide array of ships, each with its own unique stats and abilities.

Player Progression: Improve your skills and unlock more powerful vessels as you advance through the game.

Character Customization


Customize your appearance and make a statement in the world we offer. Explore a wide assortment of equippable items, available for plunder or crafting, to create a look that sets you apart. Stand out from the crowd as you embark on your adventure in a realm where individuality reigns supreme. The choice is yours to craft a distinct image and embrace your personal flair!

Plunder


Embark on a treacherous journey through a world of plundered loot. Lay claim to riches by taking from others, but beware, for they can do the same to you! Prepare for an intense game of risk and reward in this high-stakes pirate adventure!

Crafting


While you explore, seize the opportunity to gather resources or plunder valuable items, progressively honing your crafting skills to create even better and more diverse items for your adventures.

Npcs


Explore an immersive open world where NPCs are more than just bystanders. Engage in intense encounters as they not only challenge players but also battle each other. Witness unexpected conflicts and alliances that shape your journey. Experience a living, breathing environment where every moment is thrilling and unpredictable!

name: Plunder: Scourge of the Sea
short_description: Challenge the malevolent Scourge in Plunder Scourge of the Sea, an immersive MMO pirate adventure. PvP battles, PvE quests, and a race against the curse's evil influence. Unite, craft, build, and rise as a hero to cleanse the seas. Will you succumb or conquer? The fate of all pirates awaits!
